result.markdown:
---
title: 'Wordcloud'
description: 'Me trying a text analysis after failing the "basic" hackerrank test'
author: 'Coy'
date: '9/29/2022'
categories:
  - R
  - string
  - analysis
---


This is me working out a wordcloud after failing the hackerrank basic R test...


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tx = "Everything seems to go round above my head,
and within my stomach... The feeling is as if
reality itself was indistinguishable from a dream...
should I be concearned about this? maybe seek for 
professional help? or is this to be expected
when you get fired? Time will tell..."
tx
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "Everything seems to go round above my head,\nand within my stomach... The feeling is as if\nreality itself was indistinguishable from a dream...\nshould I be concearned about this? maybe seek for \nprofessional help? or is this to be expected\nwhen you get fired? Time will tell..."
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
strsplit(tx, split = ' ')
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[[1]]
 [1] "Everything"        "seems"             "to"               
 [4] "go"                "round"             "above"            
 [7] "my"                "head,\nand"        "within"           
[10] "my"                "stomach..."        "The"              
[13] "feeling"           "is"                "as"               
[16] "if\nreality"       "itself"            "was"              
[19] "indistinguishable" "from"              "a"                
[22] "dream...\nshould"  "I"                 "be"               
[25] "concearned"        "about"             "this?"            
[28] "maybe"             "seek"              "for"              
[31] "\nprofessional"    "help?"             "or"               
[34] "is"                "this"              "to"               
[37] "be"                "expected\nwhen"    "you"              
[40] "get"               "fired?"            "Time"             
[43] "will"              "tell..."          
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
strsplit(tx, split = '[:blank:]')
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[[1]]
 [1] "Everythi"                "g seems to go rou"      
 [3] "d "                      ""                       
 [5] "ove my he"               "d,\n"

 [9] " my stom"                "ch... The fee"          
[11] "i"                       "g is "                  
[13] "s if\nre"                ""                       
[15] "ity itse"                "f w"                    
[17] "s i"                     "disti"                  
[19] "guish"                   ""                       
[21] ""                        "e from "                
[23] " dre"                    "m...\nshou"             
[25] "d I "                    "e co"                   
[27] "ce"                      "r"                      
[29] "ed "                     ""

[33] "e see"                   " for \nprofessio"       
[35] ""                        ""                       
[37] " he"                     "p? or is this to "      
[39] "e expected\nwhe"         " you get fired? Time wi"
[41] ""                        " te"                    
[43] ""                        "..."                    
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# strsplit(tx, split = '[:blank:]', perl = TRUE)
strsplit(tx, split = '[ \n]')
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[[1]]
 [1] "Everything"        "seems"             "to"               
 [4] "go"                "round"             "above"            
 [7] "my"                "head,"             "and"              
[10] "within"            "my"                "stomach..."       
[13] "The"               "feeling"           "is"               
[16] "as"                "if"                "reality"          
[19] "itself"            "was"               "indistinguishable"
[22] "from"              "a"                 "dream..."         
[25] "should"            "I"                 "be"               
[28] "concearned"        "about"             "this?"            
[31] "maybe"             "seek"              "for"              
[34] ""                  "professional"      "help?"            
[37] "or"                "is"                "this"             
[40] "to"                "be"                "expected"         
[43] "when"              "you"               "get"              
[46] "fired?"            "Time"              "will"             
[49] "tell..."          
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
strsplit(tx, split = '[ \n]') |> gsub('[?.]', '', x = _)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "c(\"Everything\", \"seems\", \"to\", \"go\", \"round\", \"above\", \"my\", \"head,\", \"and\", \"within\", \"my\", \"stomach\", \"The\", \"feeling\", \"is\", \"as\", \"if\", \"reality\", \"itself\", \"was\", \"indistinguishable\", \"from\", \"a\", \"dream\", \"should\", \"I\", \"be\", \"concearned\", \"about\", \"this\", \"maybe\", \"seek\", \"for\", \"\", \"professional\", \"help\", \"or\", \"is\", \"this\", \"to\", \"be\", \"expected\", \"when\", \"you\", \"get\", \"fired\", \"Time\", \"will\", \"tell\")"
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
strsplit(tx, split = '[ \n]') |> gsub('[?.]', '', x = _) |> as.character()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "c(\"Everything\", \"seems\", \"to\", \"go\", \"round\", \"above\", \"my\", \"head,\", \"and\", \"within\", \"my\", \"stomach\", \"The\", \"feeling\", \"is\", \"as\", \"if\", \"reality\", \"itself\", \"was\", \"indistinguishable\", \"from\", \"a\", \"dream\", \"should\", \"I\", \"be\", \"concearned\", \"about\", \"this\", \"maybe\", \"seek\", \"for\", \"\", \"professional\", \"help\", \"or\", \"is\", \"this\", \"to\", \"be\", \"expected\", \"when\", \"you\", \"get\", \"fired\", \"Time\", \"will\", \"tell\")"
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
tx_bw = strsplit(tx, split = '[ \n]')
gsub('[?.]', '', tx_bw)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "c(\"Everything\", \"seems\", \"to\", \"go\", \"round\", \"above\", \"my\", \"head,\", \"and\", \"within\", \"my\", \"stomach\", \"The\", \"feeling\", \"is\", \"as\", \"if\", \"reality\", \"itself\", \"was\", \"indistinguishable\", \"from\", \"a\", \"dream\", \"should\", \"I\", \"be\", \"concearned\", \"about\", \"this\", \"maybe\", \"seek\", \"for\", \"\", \"professional\", \"help\", \"or\", \"is\", \"this\", \"to\", \"be\", \"expected\", \"when\", \"you\", \"get\", \"fired\", \"Time\", \"will\", \"tell\")"
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
vec_gsub = Vectorize(gsub)
vec_gsub('[?.]', '', tx_bw)
```

```

 [4] "go"                "round"             "above"            
 [7] "my"                "head"              "and"
```

```{.r .cell-code}
nchar(tx_bw_np)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
 [1] 10  5  2  2  5  5  2  4  3  6  2  7  3  7  2  2  2  7  6  3 17  4  1  5  6
[26]  1  2 10  5  4  5  4  3  0 12  4  2  2  4  2  2  8  4  3  3  5  4  4  4
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
n = nchar(tx_bw_np)
tx_bw_np_n = tx_bw_np[n >= 5 & n <= 10]
tx_bw_np_n
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
 [1] "Everything" "seems"      "round"      "above"      "within"    
 [6] "stomach"    "feeling"    "reality"    "itself"     "dream"     
[11] "should"     "concearned" "about"      "maybe"      "expected"  
[16] "fired"     
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
tx_bw_np_n = tolower(tx_bw_np[n >= 5 & n <= 10])
tx_bw_np_n
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
 [1] "everything" "seems"      "round"      "above"      "within"    
 [6] "stomach"    "feeling"    "reality"    "itself"     "dream"     
[11] "should"     "concearned" "about"      "maybe"      "expected"  
[16] "fired"     
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
grepl('reality', tx_bw_np_n)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
 [1] FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE  TRUE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE
[13] FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
any(grepl('reality', tx_bw_np_n))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] TRUE
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
any(grepl('real', tx_bw_np_n))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] TRUE
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
any(grepl('real', tx_bw_np_n, fixed = TRUE))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] TRUE
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
any(grepl('real', tx_bw_np_n))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] TRUE
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
any('real' %in% tx_bw_np_n)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] FALSE
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
any('reality' %in% tx_bw_np_n)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] TRUE
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
word = c('reality', 'baloon', 'itself')
any(word %in% tx_bw_np_n)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] TRUE
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
'reality' %in% tx_bw_np_n
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] TRUE
```
:::
:::
